Client

Class ControllerMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Mediator.Mediator
      • Client.ControllerMediator

  • public class ControllerMediator
extends Mediator
    Concrete implementation of a Mediator that handle and redirect requests from a set of objects that should exchange information among each other This is done in order to reduce the number of connections required in the application. The colleagues for this mediator are supposed to be: - A Controller for the Auction View - A Controller for the Register View - A reference to the global model
